message.en: This one is real.{p=0.5} The last point was simple,{p=0.2} this one not so much.
message.es: This one is real.{p=0.5} The last point was simple,{p=0.2} this one not so much.

message.en: But press on:{p=0.2} help the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] with [color=#ee8695]their[/color] own [color=#fbbbad]memories[/color].
message.es: But press on:{p=0.2} help the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] with [color=#ee8695]their[/color] own [color=#fbbbad]memories[/color].

message.en: You peer into the [color=#ee8695]point's[/color] orb and see the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] clung to a corner of [color=#ee8695]their[/color] room.
Strung on the ground is an assortment of pictures,{p=0.2} bills,{p=0.2} and prescription bottles.
message.es: Strung on the ground is an assortment of pictures,{p=0.2} bills,{p=0.2} and prescription bottles.

message.en: What would you like to [color=#fbbbad]remind[/color] the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] of?
You remind the host of their past work:{p=0.2} the blood,{p=0.2} sweat,{p=0.2} and tears dumped into their hobby projects.
message.es: You remind the host of their past work:{p=0.2} the blood,{p=0.2} sweat,{p=0.2} and tears dumped into their hobbies.

message.en: Seeing what they're capable of,{p=0.2} the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] is filled with [color=#fbbbad]determination[/color].
message.es: Seeing what they're capable of,{p=0.2} the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] is filled with [color=#fbbbad]determination[/color].

message.en: Peering closer into the orb,{p=0.2} you see a polaroid of the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] and a significant other.
message.es: Peering closer into the orb,{p=0.2} you see a polaroid of the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] and a significant other.

message.en: You remind the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] that they have someone to depend on--someone to trust.
message.es: You remind the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] that they have someone to depend on--someone to trust.

message.en: Picking up the polaroid,{p=0.2} the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] is overcome with a sense of [color=#fbbbad]comfort[/color].
message.es: Picking up the polaroid,{p=0.2} the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] is overcome with a sense of [color=#fbbbad]comfort[/color].

message.en: You remind the host that while they've gone through this before,{p=0.2} it's safer with others.
message.es: You remind the host that while they've gone through this before,{p=0.2} it's safer with others.

message.en: You manifest on image of [color=#ee8695]their[/color] mother.
message.es: You manifest on image of [color=#ee8695]their[/color] mother.

message.en: Dialing [color=#ee8695]their[/color] mother's phone number,{p=0.2} the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] is blanketed with a feeling of [color=#fbbbad]safety[/color].
message.es: Dialing [color=#ee8695]their[/color] mother's phone number,{p=0.2} the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] is blanketed with a feeling of [color=#fbbbad]safety[/color].
